description: Multiple directory traversal vulnerabilities in Xangati XSR before 11 and XNR before 7 allow remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in (1) the file parameter in a getUpgradeStatus action to servlet/MGConfigData, (2) the download parameter in a download action to servlet/MGConfigData, (3) the download parameter in a port_svc action to servlet/MGConfigData, (4) the file parameter in a getfile action to servlet/Installer, or (5) the binfile parameter to servlet/MGConfigData.
